sections.heading: intent.It is the intent of the Legislature to adopt a central filing system for security interests relating to farm products pursuant to section 1324 of the Food Security Act of 1985, Public Law 99-198
sections.text: It is also the intent of the Legislature that upon the adoption of the central filing system that

sections.heading: 52-1301 through 52-1321 were not intended to remove regular U
sections.text: C.C. provisions regarding the creation, perfection, or priority of security interests. Battle Creek State Bank v. Preusker, 253 Neb. 502, 571 N.W.2d 294 (1997).
